descriptionNullable:
### Context

This dataset can be used for practising multiclass image classification. 


### Content

The dataset contains images of 50 species of butterflies from around the world.
It contains two directories "TRAIN" and "TEST" with 4479 and 500 images respectively. 

The training images are provided in the directory of the specific class itself. The names of the directories are "class labels" to be used for prediction.

The TEST images can be ignored for practise as it doesn't contain the labels. 


### Acknowledgements

I got this dataset from https://dockship.io/ from a challenge hosted there.


### Inspiration

To build powerful Neural Network models that can classify these images with high level of accuracy.
title: Butterfly Classification Dataset
subtitle: Dataset of 50 Types of Butterflies

The training images are provided in the directory of the specific class itself. The names of the directories are "class labels" to be used for prediction.

The TEST images can be ignored for practise as it doesn't contain the labels.
